name: The day Fish Fly
description:
I short card battler made for Mini-jam 91 UFO, under the limit "Fish had to be a mechanic" I really wanted to add deck building but alas deadlines heh

Im short on time and energy so sorry for lack of tutorial

W = move up (costs 1 move)
S = move Down (costs 1 move
E = end turn

The Deck is:

5x Basic Shot
3x Reload
3x Move
1x Sniper Aim

Kicking it powerful, By null1024 licensed under CC BY 3.0
https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=170242
